name: nexthink
label: Nexthink
description: Nexthink is an automation and remediation platform which delivers visibility across all environments so IT teams can continuously improve the digital workplace to optimize productivity and cost.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: URL of the Nexthink server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Username
fields.name: username
fields.description: Username used to access the Nexthink server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Password
fields.name: password
fields.description: Password used to access the Nexthink server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the Nexthink server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.name: verify_ssl

operations.title: Run Query
operations.description: Runs a search query using Nexthink Query Language grammar to fetch the records from the in-memory Engine database.

parameters.title: Query
parameters.name: query
parameters.tooltip: Specify the NXQL query to execute.
parameters.description: Specify the NXQL query to execute.

parameters.title: Platform
parameters.name: platform
parameters.tooltip: Specify the target platform of the query. There can be multiple platforms. Supported platforms are windows, mac_os and mobile.
parameters.description: Specify the target platform of the query. There can be multiple platforms. Supported platforms are windows, mac_os and mobile.
